title: Emergency Server Patching
description: A critical, zero-day vulnerability is announced for the operating system used by all web servers. An analyst must coordinate emergency patching.

tasks.description: Identify all servers in the asset inventory that are running the vulnerable operating system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst generates a complete list of all affected servers.

tasks.description: Schedule an emergency maintenance window and deploy the security patch to all affected servers using an automated patch management tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully deploys the patch to all servers.

tasks.description: Run a follow-up vulnerability scan to verify that the patch was successfully applied and the vulnerability is remediated on all servers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms that all servers are no longer vulnerable.
